scripts.cover: $(npm bin)/babel-node $(npm bin)/isparta cover --report lcovonly --report html $(npm bin)/_mocha -- --reporter dot && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | $(npm bin)/coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run clean
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.preversion: npm run clean && npm run test
